add: To request new language support translate the downloaded file and email it to adamberryhuff@gmail.com

instructions.header:
The chart will render in realtime at the top of the page.

In the nav you can render the demo chart, download a PNG of your chart, import a previously exported chart configuration, export the current chart configuration, or reset the chart data. You can also change your desired currency.

header.demo_tt: Load demo data and render demo chart.
header.demo_confirmation: Are you sure you want to load demo data? Your current configuration will be lost.
header.download_tt: Download a PNG image of the chart.
header.download_error: You must input chart data before you can download the chart!
header.export_error: You must input chart data before you can export the config file!
header.reset_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset?

incomes.title: Input your annual income stream(s) and the tax rate you expect to pay.
incomes.instructions: In the Income Streams section you can add your streams of income including tax rates and the tax-exempt investment account like your 401k.
incomes.chart_label_examples: The label will be used in the chart: Salary, Rental Income, etc.
incomes.gross_amount_examples: The amount ({mode}) you make annually from this income stream (pre-tax).
incomes.tax_rate_examples: The tax rate (%) of this income stream.
incomes.exemptions_question: Does this income stream have any tax-exempt contributions?
incomes.deductions_question: Does this income stream have any pre-tax deductions?
incomes.pretax_error: Tax-exempt contributions and deductions cannot be more than income stream amount!
incomes.reduction_error: In order to make this update you must have at least {required_total} into your unallocated budget. You must remove an additional {required_additional} in expenses or investments.
incomes.tax_error: Income stream tax rate should be between 1 and 100.
incomes.value_error: Income stream amount must be positive number.
incomes.deletion_error: You cannot remove this income stream until you free up at least {required_total} into your unallocated budget. You must remove an additional {required_additional}.
incomes.deletion_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this income stream?
incomes.exemption_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this exemption?
incomes.exemption_value_error: Exemption amount must be greater or equal to 0.
incomes.exemption_match_error: Exemption match amount must be greater or equal to 0.
incomes.deduction_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this deduction?
incomes.deduction_value_error: Deduction amount must be greater or equal to 0.
incomes.deduction_examples: Examples: Social Security, Medicare, Health Insurance
incomes.no_incomes: You haven't added any income streams yet.
incomes.edit_instructions: Click on an income stream to edit or remove it.

expenses.instructions: In the Expenses section you can add your expected expenses such as mortgage payments, rent, and other living expenses.
expenses.title: Input your annual expenses.
expenses.chart_label_examples: The label will be used in the chart: Mortgage, Living Expenses, Car Payment, etc.
expenses.amount_examples: The amount ({mode}) you pay annually for this expense.
expenses.value_error: Expense amount must be a positive number!
expenses.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this expense?
expenses.difference_error_edit: Expense difference must be less than your available budget of {budget}
expenses.difference_error_add: Expense must be less than your available budget of {budget}
expenses.no_expenses: You haven't added any expenses yet.
expenses.edit_instructions: Click on an expense to edit or remove it.

investments.instructions: In the Investments section you can add your expected investment contribtions. The pre-tax contributions you entered in the Income Streams section will automatically show up here.
investments.title: Input your annual post-tax investment contributions.
investments.chart_label_examples: The label will be used in the chart: Stocks, Bonds, Roth IRA, Extra Mortgage Payment, etc.
investments.amount_examples: The amount ({mode}) you invest annually in this fund.
investments.value_error: Investment amount must be a positive number!
investments.difference_error_edit: Investment difference must be less than your available budget of {budget}
investments.difference_error_add: Investment must be less than your available budget of {budget}
investments.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this investment?
investments.no_investments: You haven't added any investments yet.
investments.edit_instructions: Click on an investment to edit or remove it.
investments.uneditable: Edit tax-exempt contributions using the 'Incomes' interface at the top of the page.
